name: Unown J
author: Kent Kanetsuna
flavor_text: Shaped like an ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.

poke_power.name: JUNK
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Unown J from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Remove the Special Condition Asleep from the Defending Pokémon.
